definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Studies indicate that the connection with welded haunch shifts plastic hinge away from the face of the column.
sentences.chinese: 加腋型节点的塑性铰在远离柱翼缘面的梁上形成。

sentences.english: The single span girders are linked with one another and freely supported on top of rigid piers.
sentences.chinese: 桥的邻跨梁相互铰连并自由置放在桥墩的顶面上。

sentences.english: The dentist reamed out the debris in the course of the root canal treatment.
sentences.chinese: 在进行根管处理过程中，这名牙医铰除了碎屑。

sentences.english: He picked up a wallet in the street and gave it to a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 他在街上拾到一个钱包，把它铰给了警察。

sentences.english: The Formula of ultimate flexural capacity is given according to Plastic Principle.
sentences.chinese: 通过塑性铰理论，推导了加固后梁的承载力计算公式。

sentences.english: The hardware hinge adopts super-heavy design, and the door leaf can be opened easily.
sentences.chinese: 五金门铰采用超重型设计，门扇轻松开启。

sentences.english: Nung-fu needs a new blade for the old shredder.
sentences.chinese: 农夫的老旧铰碎机需换新刀片。

sentences.english: Reinforced toggle bearings with low-maintenance toggle sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 增强的机铰轴承，机铰套维护低。

sentences.english: In his early years, he worked as craftsman repairing iron wares and wooden furniture.
sentences.chinese: 早年做过修理铁木器具的工人，被人称为“胡钉铰”。

sentences.english: In this paper, the stability and control of a hingeless helicopter in wind shear were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了无铰直升机在风切变场中的稳定性和操纵性。

sentences.english: Screw-on hinge, heavy duty for LH and RH applications.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝固定式门铰，左右门均适用。

sentences.english: Impact dynamics of multi-rigid-body systems with joint friction was considered.
sentences.chinese: 研究了含铰摩擦的多刚体系统的碰撞动力学问题。

sentences.english: The question of public housing should be taken up with the Ministerwhose responsibility it is.
sentences.chinese: 公众的住房问题应该提铰负责这项工作的部长考虑。

definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
(dialect) to bend (a long and thin object)
